attributes.action: make all newspapers responsible for false reporting on the state of family accomodation and bases within the British Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We challenge the Prime Minister to ensure that, before a newspaper is permitted to print a story regarding the state of fmaily accomodation or that on the actual bases within the UK, they have to have solid proof from numerous sources.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
